title: The Stayner Brothers // 17
description:
In 1972, a 7-year-old boy was abducted while walking home from school in Northern California. 7 years later, he finally broke free of his captor and reunited with his family- but his new life was far from normal. In 1999, 4 women were murdered in Yosemite National Park- and the abducted boy's older brother is the main suspect. This is the case of Steven and Cary Stayner.
**GOING WEST DOES NOT OWN ANY OF THE NEWS CLIPS PRESENTED**
ABC News 1980: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHaMlS2txsA
ABC News 20/20 Extra: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EBRhaW-Ak6M
